description: Redevelopment to provide a basement plus six storey building to provide retail, financial and professional and restaurant use at ground and basement level and 60 residential units above.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Deliveries to the retail and restaurant uses shall only take place during the following hours 06:00 to 07:00 and 19:00 to midnight.  Outside of these hours no deliveries to the retail and restaurant uses shall take place.

REASON:  In order to protect the amenities of neighbouring residential properties and the free flow of trafic along Holloway Road.
